Docs.param: Instance of ICharacterLcd. This method can be called as extension method on this instance
Index of the character to create in the hardware character table
First row data (standard displays only use the lower 5 bits of each row)
Docs.summary: Creates a custom character for standard displays with 8-pixel-per-row characters. See for details.
